title: Awesome apple coleslaw
ingredients: ['225g cabbage, chopped', '1 unpeeled red apple, cored and chopped', '1 unpeeled Granny Smith apple, cored and chopped', '1 carrot, grated', '1/2 red pepper, finely sliced', '2 spring onions, finely chopped', '75ml mayonnaise', '75g dark brown soft sugar', '1 tablespoon lemon juice or to taste']
